items.sentence: I'm thinking about visiting my friend next year.
I'm appalled at how badly those children behave.
I'm alive all right, but don't ask where or how.
Bad drivers drive up everyone's insurance costs.
Tom was driving home when the accident happened.
The last time I saw Tom, he was driving a truck.
Maybe Tom doesn't like Boston as much as you do.
Who other than Tom would do something like that?
I got married last year. My wife's name is Mary.
How soon do you think these changes can be made.
